# sbb-group

The `sbb-group` is a simple layout component which has several variants of color and padding.

```html
<sbb-group color="milk" padding="XXS-XXS">
  Content
</sbb-group>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                    | Type                                                                            | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`   | `color`   | Background color of the group. | `"milk" \| "transparent" \| "white"`                                            | `'white'`   |
| `padding` | `padding` | Padding variant of the group.  | `"3X-XXS" \| "4X-XXS" \| "L-L" \| "S-S" \| "XXS-XXS" \| "XXXS-S" \| "XXXS-XXS"` | `'XXS-XXS'` |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description          |
| ----------- | -------------------- |
| `"unnamed"` | Content of the group |


----------------------------------------------
